pages.extract: Advanced crypto trading platform with AI assistance
pages.meta_description: Advanced crypto trading platform with AI assistance
paragraphs: Next-gen crypto trading & advanced market analytics. AI-powered insights, and seamless trading experience for crypto traders.
Advanced algorithms and smart trading recommendations
LUMI Terminal combines advanced trading tools with AI-powered insights to give you the edge in crypto markets.
Get notified instantly when tokens hit key breakout levels, trend on social platforms, or get added to top watchlists. LUMI filters noise and only delivers high-signal alerts.
Feature 6 of 6
Real-time market data, top gainer tracking, and multi-chain token scanners. Includes technical analysis overlays, smart charting, and custom indicators built for precision trading.
Feature 1 of 6
LUMI's neural agent scans thousands of signals per second — from volume surges to sentiment spikes — and delivers high-conviction, actionable trade setups across all major narratives.
Feature 2 of 6
Trade with speed and control. Use sniper mode for new launches, flipper mode for fast rotations, and smart routing for best price across DEXs — all within the terminal or via Telegram.
Feature 3 of 6
Track your holdings, analyze performance, and optimize your crypto portfolio allocation.
Feature 4 of 6
Deploy automated strategies with no code. Use AI triggers like whale activity, price action, or volume breakouts to automate execution across all your trades.
Feature 5 of 6
Get notified instantly when tokens hit key breakout levels, trend on social platforms, or get added to top watchlists. LUMI filters noise and only delivers high-signal alerts.
Feature 6 of 6
Real-time market data, top gainer tracking, and multi-chain token scanners. Includes technical analysis overlays, smart charting, and custom indicators built for precision trading.
Feature 1 of 6
Whether you're a day trader, long-term investor, or passive earner, LUMI has the tools you need.
The fastest way to interact with LUMI. Execute trades, scan tokens, snipe new listings, or request whale tracking—all from within your Telegram chat.
LUMI's presence on X delivers continuous market updates, narrative tracking, and alpha in real time—autonomously.
The full-featured, AI-powered trading command center. Chart, scan, execute, and deploy strategies—all in one seamless experience.

LUMI's charting engine is built for traders who move fast and think technically. Whether you're spotting breakouts, timing entries, or mapping support zones — LUMI gives you the visual clarity and automated analysis to act with confidence.

The LUMI Terminal is your AI-powered command center for everything crypto. Trade directly through the chat console or use one-click buttons to execute with speed and precision. LUMI handles the routing, slippage, and analysis — so you can focus on the strategy.

LUMI delivers a real-time intelligence layer that tracks top wallet movements, buy/sell walls, and wallet-level sentiment shifts across key tokens. The Token buy/sell walls, and wallet-level sentiment shifts across key tokens. The Token Feed monitors trending assets, new listings across CEXs and DEXs, and smart money behavior with scoring indicators to surface high-probability setups.
AI-powered analysis of market trends, token movements, and trading opportunities in real-time.
Monitor large wallet movements and smart money flows to anticipate market shifts before they happen.
Comprehensive market analysis, token integrations, and sector rotation insights.
Join thousands of traders who are already using LUMI to gain an edge in the crypto markets.
